InfluenceRule.name: r likes something lame that i dislikes
r has something gross that i dislikes
*** r did something mean to someone i doesn't have a beef with
i wants to pick on r
i wants to pick on r
i homewrecked r and i is mean
*** r is popular and i isn't
i wants to pick on r
i wants to pick on r
i is out talked by r
*** i is witty, r is dumb

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% insulted %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% didn't get it
%i% insulted %r%
%list(i,r,and)% had like a catfight
%i% brought the smackdown to %r%
%i% totally backstabbed %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were friends
%i% totally trashed %r% because %list(i,r,we/they)% were enemies
%r% thought %is% %pron(i,was/were)% being nice instead of mean
%r% thought %is% %pron(i,was/were)% being flirty instead of mean
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too nice to make fun of %r%
%list(i,r,and)% had that awkward public fight
%i% dissed %rp% clothes
%i% insulted %r% with that annoying nickname
%i% kept insulting %r%
%i% insulted %r% for being unfaithful
%i% insulted %r% for being old news
%i% insulted %r% for being a homewrecker
%i% insulted %r% with the power of math
%i% told %r% %pron(r,he/she)% looked like a whale but %rs% took it in stride
%list(i,r,and)% came to like an insult stalemate
%i% insulted %r% but %prons(r,he/she)% had %pron(r,his/her)% headphones in
%i% insulted %r% for trying to creep into %pron(i,his/her)% relationship with %o%
%r% just laughed at %ip% attempt to stop %pron(r,him/her)% from hanging out with %o%
%i% called %r% names
%i% made fun of that nice thing %r% did
%i% made fun of that nice thing %o% did to %r%
%i% made a sad attempt to make fun of %r% for doing something nice
%r% schooled %i% for trying to make fun of that lame thing %prons(r,he/she)% did
%i% made fun of that lame thing %r% did

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Why, %r%! I'm surprised to see you here.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh? Why's that?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(I didn't realize the city limits of Loserville reached this far,I thought they took out the trash this morning,I usually smell you coming way before I see you,I thought they took you back to the pound last week,I didn't think Whale World was open on weekdays,I thought you were still under quarantine,I thought the new health care plan got rid of pre-existing conditions)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Go eat rocks,Get lost,Go suck a dodgeball,Why don't you fall down a staircase and die,How about you go into quarantine,Die in a fire)%, %random(loser,idiot,pizza face,crapface,moron,you dumb stupid person,puke for brains)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%! Where'd you get those clothes, a thrift store?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I totally did! Wow, it's great to find someone else as fashionable and frugal as me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... uh... never mind.
Oh, hello, %r%. You look different. Have you gained weight?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? No.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe it's just your hair. Did you steal that look from like an '80s music video, or are you just naturally unfashionable?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get lost, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh look, it's %r%. Voted '%random(Most Likely To Die Alone,Most Likely To Get Voted Out Of School If Only Things Worked That Way,Least Attractive Mascot)%' by the yearbook staff %random(this year,three years running)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: At least I'm not going to end up %random(marrying my cousin,in jail for doing unspeakable things to common household items,fat and pathetic,working retail for the rest of my life)% like you will.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(Die in a fire,You are *such* a freakshow,I hate you,Suck my dress socks,Eat cafeteria food)%, %pejorative%.
Well, if it isn't %r%, official school %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell? I thought we were friends!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You can think whatever you like.
Oh look, it's %r%. You're looking particularly %gender(r,dweeby,chunky)% today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, you're such a kidder. I am not!
I'd be mad, but you're cool enough to get away with it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...uh, whatever, %gender(r,man,babe)%.
Oh look, it's %r%. Nice outfit, loser.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh thanks %i% I'm glad you like it! And I *have* lost weight recently, thanks so much for noticing!
Stay sexy, hot stuff.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...uh, whatever, %gender(r,man,babe)%.
Oh... hey... %r%. You... you've got a... uh, I mean, your mom's so fat that, uh...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you trying to insult me?
That's sweet of you to try, %i%, but everyone knows you're too much of a nice %gender(i,guy,girl)% to pull it off.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Your MOM's a nice %gender(i,guy,girl)%! I mean... wait...
Well, if it isn't %r%, official school %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Get lost, %i%. Did you run out of puppies to kick?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just came by to remind you how stupid your stupid face is.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Real mature. What are you, like, 9?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Perfect 10, %gender(r,buddy,baby)%.
Oh look, here comes the old ball and chain.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nice to see you too, you %random(magnificant failure of a,hateful snake of a,pitiful excuse for a)% %gender(i,man,woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Funny, that was going to be my line. Except you're not much of a %gender(i,man,woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %if(0,Why am I dating such a sexist jerk?)elseif(1,Why am I dating such a sexist jerk?)else(That doesn't even make sense. Why am I dating someone so incoherent?)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh please. As if anyone else would date you. You put up with me out of necessity.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I could put up with your corpse just as easily, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %r%, seriously? I thought I told you that you look terrible in that outfit.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you talking about? I wear this all the time!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yes... yes, I've noticed.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, what's wrong?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing *you'd* understand.
Hey, %pejorative%-%buddy%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Stop calling me that! I told you I hate it when you call me that.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever. You love it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Go bite %random(a laptop case,a gopher feeder,a lawnmower,an ice crampon)%, %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Harsh. We still hanging out later?

Oh, I forgot to tell you earlier... %random(you're also a loser,yearbook voted you most likely to succeed at sucking,about those rabid squirrels in your locker-that was me,I totally posted those pictures of you looking really fat on your profile page)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What the hell is your deal, %pejorative%? Why don't you pick on someone else for a while?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: The point is you suck.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Die in a fire,Go eat a rake,Get lost,STFU,Go. Away)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You pig.
You monster.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %sweetie%, what's going on?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: DON'T GIVE ME THAT! I know my arms aren't the only ones you call home now.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Nonsense, they're still the only ones I want!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Your lips only spew lies, you heathen.
Certain things have come up recently %r%... And my opinions and standards have changed, dramatically.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What are you saying?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're old news, %sweetie%. I've come to understand just how lame and %pejorative%-y you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...I don't understand.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're ugly.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You %pejorative%.

Instantiation.name: Insult - Dating (i/o) R is Homewrecker Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You conniving %gender(r,man-slut,harlot)%. I saw what you were doing with my %o%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(r,Man-slut,Harlot)!? That's a bit rude, don't you think?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: There's no words rude enough to describe you. I saw those status updates. You think I don't know what you're doing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... you know...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, shut up. Don't say anything else, you fat, ugly %gender(r,incubus,succubus)%.
Don't let me catch you talking to my %o% again!
Oh hey %r%. I was just thinking about you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh really? Something good I hope!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hah! Not really. I was just thinking about how your intelligence is much like the limit of 1/x as x goes to stupid.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I don't even know what that means, but I feel insulted somehow.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Mission accomplished.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%! What do you think about my outfit? Do you think I look less 'shapely'?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No, to be honest, you still look like a whale. Lose the top.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What!? How dare you! I didn't ask to be insulted!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Er, no, I'm sorry! I'm just a brutally honest person by nature. I figured that's why you came to me. I didn't mean any harm by it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well... I guess you're right. *sigh* 'BetterWill' scores another outfit...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're the worst.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Funny, I was thinking the same about you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: When did your %pejorative%-camp let out?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Probably around the same time they kicked you out of the %pejorative%-circus for exceeding their standards.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You're good. It seems we've come to a stalemate...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yes, quite. I couldn't think of a better rival.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Listen %sweetie%. I just can't stand being around you anymore.
You sicken me. Your skin smells like greasy bacon, and your hair reminds me of seaweed.
Just the thought of kissing your lips makes me erk in disgust.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh hey %sweetie%! Sorry, what'd you say? I had my headphones in!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: ...Forget it.

Instantiation.name: Insult - R friends with I's bf/gf. I enemies with R, becomes jealous Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I want you to stop hanging out with my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: And why should I do that? %gender(o,He,She)%'s my friend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just can't stand seeing your %pejorative% face around %pron(o,him/her)% all the time. It seriously disgusts me.
You're ruining everything!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Good. I think I'll text %o% right now and ask %pron(o,him/her)% to cancel %pron(o,his/her)% plans with you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You will die.

Instantiation.name: Insult - R friends with I's bf/gf. I enemies with R, becomes jealous Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh %i%, what do you want?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I want you to stop hanging around my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%. %gender(o,He,She)% doesn't like you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We're just friends, why are you getting all bent out of shape over this?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just want to make sure things are taken care of. I don't want you ruining anything.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You're jealous of me aren't you? That's pretty funny, and pathetic.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Stop laughing at me. Just get out of my life.

%r%, %random(I've always been curious,I often wonder,I've always wondered,I'm really curious)%... %random(how did you get to be so,why are you so,how did you get so)% %random(fat,stupid,ugly,unattractive,conceited,stuck-up)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(I am rubber you are glue. It bounces off me and sticks to you.,You're stupid.,That's a lie. Take it back.,You can't get away with saying things like that.,Don't talk to me you jerk.,Shut up.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, %random(bravo,well played,my what a witty retort,that's precious,you sure schooled me,devastating comeback,I'm quaking in my booties,how original,you got me)%! %random(Is that the best you got?,You want some more?,I can do this all day.,I'm just getting started.,You can do better than that.,Just what I'd expect from you.)%

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(I'll get you.,This isn't over.,What's your problem?,Creep.,Jerk.,Bully.,What are you in third grade?,Grow up.,Get a life.,Get out of my face.,Save it.,Talk to the hand.,Go eat a banana slug.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. I saw %toc1%. %random(So precious!,Totally adorable!,So cute!)% Are you like %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend now?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Stop stalking me,Get a life,Mind your own business,Grow up)%, %random(creep,freakshow,creepshow,idiot)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. I saw %toc1%. %random(So precious!,Totally adorable!,So cute!)% Is %pron(o,he/she)% like your %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend now?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Stop stalking me,Get a life,Mind your own business,Grow up)%, %random(creep,freakshow,creepshow,idiot)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%. I saw %toc1%. %random(So precious!,Totally adorable!,So cute!)% Are you like %pron(o,his/her)% %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend now?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Are you seriously making fun of people for doing nice things now,That's really the best you can do,That's all the dirt you can come up with)%, %i%? %random(Pretty pathetic,Sad,I'm disappointed)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Shut up, goody two-shoes.
Hey %pejorative%... %random(I could help but notice when,I totally saw how,I heard about how)% %toc1%. %random(Pathetic,Hilarious,Sooo lame,Absolutely classic)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Leave me alone,Mind your own business,Why can't you just keep your nose out of other people's affairs,Nobody asked you to watch that,Why don't you stop spying on people)%, you %random(creep,failure,jerk,phony)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Ooh, %random(looks like I touched a nerve,must be a sore spot,they doth protest too much methinks,somebody's embarrassed)%.
Hey %pejorative%... %random(I could help but notice when,I totally saw how,I heard about how)% %toc1%. %random(Pathetic,Hilarious,Sooo lame,Absolutely classic)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(OMG,Holy crap,Good god)%, %i%, %random(grow up,get a life,get over yourself)%. Nobody cares about your grade school gossip. %random(Get over it,Just move on)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well.... it was lame! And YOU'RE lame, and...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Are you done yet?,We done here?)%
